perturbation.original_text: (b)    Future  Purchase  Orders  and  delivery  will  approximate  the  15 day        delivery schedule (but not the dates), although payment will be made by        COMWARE to ITS no later than thirty (30) days after  receipt of invoice        from ITS.
perturbation.changed_text: (b)    Future  Purchase  Orders  and  delivery  will  approximate  the  15 day        delivery schedule (but not the dates), although payment will be made by        COMWARE to ITS no later than forty-five (45) days after  receipt of invoice        from ITS.
perturbation.explanation: This change creates a contradiction by extending the payment deadline in section 3(b) to 45 days, conflicting with the payment term established in section 3(a) which states that initial orders must be paid by April 15, 2000. This introduces uncertainty about the correct payment deadline and when late payment penalties would apply.

perturbation.original_text:
4.   RENEWAL  PERIOD:  Provided  that COMWARE  purchases a minimum of $45,420.00      worth of  Products,  in any  combination,  during the Initial  Distribution



     Period,  this Agreement will automatically renew for an additional 6 months      (the Renewal  Period).  In the event COMWARE  purchases an amount less than      $45,420.00, than this Agreement will automatically terminate.
perturbation.changed_text:
4.   RENEWAL  PERIOD:  Provided  that COMWARE  purchases a minimum of $45,420.00      worth of  Products,  in any  combination,  during the Initial  Distribution



     Period,  this Agreement will automatically renew for an additional 6 months      (the Renewal  Period).  In the event COMWARE  purchases an amount less than      $45,420.00, this Agreement will be automatically extended for 3 months to allow COMWARE to meet purchase requirements, after which, if the minimum amount is not met, the agreement will automatically terminate.
perturbation.explanation: This creates a contradiction by introducing a clause that extends the agreement for 3 months, if COMWARE purchases less than $45,420, giving them an opportunity to meet the purchase requirements. This directly conflicts with the original clause in Section 4 which states the agreement will automatically terminate if the minimum amount isn't met.

perturbation.original_text: 8.   WARRANTY:  ITS  Products  are  warranted  free from  defects of material or      workmanship  for 3 years after  shipment from the  manufacturer.  Equipment      purchased from ITS, which becomes defective within that time period will be      repaired by ITS at its  headquarters  in San  Antonio,  Texas at no cost to      COMWARE  beyond cost of shipping  the  equipment  to ITS. ITS will bear the      cost of returning the item to COMWARE by UPS,  REGULAR  DELIVERY.  priority      shipping costs will be borne by COMWARE.
perturbation.changed_text: 8.   WARRANTY:  ITS  Products  are  warranted  free from  defects of material or      workmanship  for 1 year after  shipment from the  manufacturer.  Equipment      purchased from ITS, which becomes defective within that time period will be      repaired by ITS at its  headquarters  in San  Antonio,  Texas at no cost to      COMWARE  beyond cost of shipping  the  equipment  to ITS. ITS will bear the      cost of returning the item to COMWARE by UPS,  REGULAR  DELIVERY.  priority      shipping costs will be borne by COMWARE.
perturbation.explanation: This change creates a contradiction in the terms of the warranty by reducing the warranty period from 3 years to 1 year. This contradicts the original warranty term and creates ambiguity regarding the coverage period for product defects, potentially leading to disputes between the parties.
